mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_REQUEST (id, requestdate, bookname,bookCode, pricesales,writer,quantity,genre,link, imageurl, isbn, publisher, summary) VALUES (#{id}, now(),#{bookname},#{bookCode},#{priceSales},#{writer},#{quantity},#{genre},#{link},#{imageurl},#{isbn}, #{publisher}, #{summary})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_REQUEST SET bookCode='0' WHERE bookCode=#{bookCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOOK_REQUEST AS A, BOOK_MEMBER AS B WHERE A.id=B.id AND A.bookCode!='0' ORDER BY A.requestdate DESC;

SELECT * FROM BOOK_REQUEST AS A
WHERE A.id=#{id} AND A.bookCode='0' AND (A.requestdate BETWEEN date_sub(NOW(), interval 365 day) AND NOW()) ORDER BY A.requestdate DESC;
SELECT * FROM BOOKMST AS A, BOOK_BORROW AS B WHERE B.borrowcheck=1 AND A.bookCode=B.bookCode ORDER BY B.borrowdate DESC;
SELECT * FROM BOOKMST AS A, BOOK_BORROW AS B WHERE B.id = #{id} AND (B.borrowcheck='1' OR B.borrowcheck='2') AND A.bookCode=B.bookCode ORDER BY B.borrowdate DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_BORROW (bookCode, borrowdate, returndate, borrowcheck, id) VALUES(#{bookCode}, now(), date_add(now(), interval +20 day), 1, #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOKMST SET borrowcheck='1' WHERE bookCode=#{bookCode}
UPDATE BOOKMST A ,BOOK_BORROW B SET A.borrowcheck='4' WHERE A.bookCode=#{bookCode} AND A.borrowcheck='0'
UPDATE BOOKMST A SET A.borrowcheck='0' WHERE A.bookCode=#{bookCode} AND A.borrowcheck='4'
UPDATE BOOKMST A INNER JOIN BOOK_BORROW B ON A.borrowcheck = B.borrowcheck SET A.borrowcheck='2', B.borrowcheck='2', B.borrowdate=NOW() WHERE A.bookCode=#{bookCode} AND B.bookCode=#{bookCode}
UPDATE BOOK_MEMBER SET numborrow = numborrow + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE BOOKMST A INNER JOIN BOOK_BORROW B ON A.borrowcheck = B.borrowcheck SET A.borrowcheck='0', B.borrowcheck='3', B.returndate=NOW() WHERE A.bookCode=#{bookCode} AND B.bookCode=#{bookCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOOKMST AS A, BOOK_BORROW AS B WHERE B.borrowcheck=3 AND A.bookCode=B.bookCode;
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_BORROW SET returndate = date_add(now(), interval +20 day) WHERE bookCode=#{bookCode} AND borrowcheck='2';
UPDATE BOOKMST SET borrowcheck='0' WHERE bookCode=#{bookCode} AND borrowcheck='1';
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOOKMST AS A, BOOK_BORROW AS B WHERE A.bookCode=B.bookCode AND B.borrowcheck='2' ORDER BY B.borrowdate DESC;

SELECT * FROM BOOKMST AS A, BOOK_BORROW AS B WHERE (B.returndate BETWEEN date_sub(NOW(), interval 90 day) AND NOW()) AND B.id=#{id} AND A.bookCode=B.bookCode AND B.borrowcheck='3' ORDER BY B.returndate DESC;
SELECT * FROM BOOKMST AS A, BOOK_BORROW AS B WHERE (B.returndate BETWEEN date_sub(NOW(), interval 90 day) AND NOW()) AND A.bookCode=B.bookCode AND B.borrowcheck='3' ORDER BY B.borrowdate DESC;
